00050 /* This is needed to not let VC choke on near and far... old
00051  * proprietary MS extensions... */
00052 #ifdef WIN32
00053 #undef near
00054 #undef far
00055 #define near clipsta
00056 #define far clipend
00057 #endif

00067  * code, and patch for windows. */

00069 /* Background Picture in 3D-View */
00070 typedef struct BGpic {
00071     struct BGpic *next, *prev;
00072 
00073     struct Image *ima;
00074     struct ImageUser iuser;
00075     struct MovieClip *clip;
00076     struct MovieClipUser cuser;
00077     float xof, yof, size, blend;
00078     short view;
00079     short flag;
00080     short source, pad;
00081 } BGpic;

00085 typedef struct RegionView3D {
00086     
00087     float winmat[4][4];         /* GL_PROJECTION matrix */
00088     float viewmat[4][4];        /* GL_MODELVIEW matrix */
00089     float viewinv[4][4];        /* inverse of viewmat */
00090     float persmat[4][4];        /* viewmat*winmat */
00091     float persinv[4][4];        /* inverse of persmat */
00092 
00093     /* viewmat/persmat multiplied with object matrix, while drawing and selection */
00094     float viewmatob[4][4];
00095     float persmatob[4][4];
00096 
00097 
00098     /* user defined clipping planes */
00099     float clip[6][4];
00100     float clip_local[6][4]; /* clip in object space, means we can test for clipping in editmode without first going into worldspace */
00101     struct BoundBox *clipbb;
00102 
00103     struct bGPdata *gpd;        /* Grease-Pencil Data (annotation layers) */
00104 
00105     struct RegionView3D *localvd; /* allocated backup of its self while in localview */
00106     struct RenderInfo *ri;
00107     struct RenderEngine *render_engine;
00108     struct ViewDepths *depths;
00109 
00110     /* animated smooth view */
00111     struct SmoothViewStore *sms;
00112     struct wmTimer *smooth_timer;
00113 
00114 
00115     /* transform widget matrix */
00116     float twmat[4][4];
00117 
00118     float viewquat[4];          /* view rotation, must be kept normalized */
00119     float dist;                 /* distance from 'ofs' along -viewinv[2] vector, where result is negative as is 'ofs' */
00120     float zfac;                 /* initgrabz() result */
00121     float camdx, camdy;         /* camera view offsets, 1.0 = viewplane moves entire width/height */
00122     float pixsize;              /* runtime only */
00123     float ofs[3];               /* view center & orbit pivot, negative of worldspace location,
00124                                  * also matches -viewinv[3][0:3] in ortho mode.*/
00125     float camzoom;              /* viewport zoom on the camera frame, see BKE_screen_view3d_zoom_to_fac */
00126     char is_persp;              /* check if persp/ortho view, since 'persp' cant be used for this since
00127                                  * it can have cameras assigned as well. (only set in setwinmatrixview3d) */
00128     char persp;
00129     char view;
00130     char viewlock;
00131 
00132     short twdrawflag;
00133     short rflag;
00134     
00135 
00136     /* last view */
00137     float lviewquat[4];
00138     short lpersp, lview; /* lpersp can never be set to 'RV3D_CAMOB' */
00139     float gridview;
00140     
00141     float twangle[3];
00142 
00143 
00144     /* active rotation from NDOF or elsewhere */
00145     float rot_angle;
00146     float rot_axis[3];
00147 
00148 } RegionView3D;

00150 /* 3D ViewPort Struct */
00151 typedef struct View3D {
00152     struct SpaceLink *next, *prev;
00153     ListBase regionbase;        /* storage of regions for inactive spaces */
00154     int spacetype;
00155     float blockscale;
00156     short blockhandler[8];
00157 
00158     float viewquat[4]  DNA_DEPRECATED;
00159     float dist         DNA_DEPRECATED;
00160 
00161     float bundle_size;          /* size of bundles in reconstructed data */
00162     short bundle_drawtype;      /* display style for bundle */
00163 
00164     char pad[6];
00165     
00166     unsigned int lay_used; /* used while drawing */
00167     
00168     short persp  DNA_DEPRECATED;
00169     short view   DNA_DEPRECATED;
00170     
00171     struct Object *camera, *ob_centre;
00172 
00173     struct ListBase bgpicbase;
00174     struct BGpic *bgpic  DNA_DEPRECATED; /* deprecated, use bgpicbase, only kept for do_versions(...) */
00175 
00176     struct View3D *localvd; /* allocated backup of its self while in localview */
00177     
00178     char ob_centre_bone[64];        /* optional string for armature bone to define center, MAXBONENAME */
00179     
00180     unsigned int lay;
00181     int layact;
00182     
00186     short drawtype;
00187     short ob_centre_cursor;     /* optional bool for 3d cursor to define center */
00188     short scenelock, around;
00189     short flag, flag2;
00190     
00191     float lens, grid;
00192     float near, far;
00193     float ofs[3]  DNA_DEPRECATED;           /* XXX deprecated */
00194     float cursor[3];
00195 
00196     short modeselect;
00197     short gridlines;
00198     short gridsubdiv;   /* Number of subdivisions in the grid between each highlighted grid line */
00199     char gridflag;
00200 
00201     /* transform widget info */
00202     char twtype, twmode, twflag, pad2[2];
00203     
00204     /* afterdraw, for xray & transparent */
00205     struct ListBase afterdraw_transp;
00206     struct ListBase afterdraw_xray;
00207     struct ListBase afterdraw_xraytransp;
00208     
00209     /* drawflags, denoting state */
00210     short zbuf, transp, xray;
00211 
00212     char pad3[2];
00213 
00214     void *properties_storage;   /* Nkey panel stores stuff here (runtime only!) */
00215 
00216     /* XXX deprecated? */
00217     struct bGPdata *gpd  DNA_DEPRECATED;        /* Grease-Pencil Data (annotation layers) */
00218 
00219 } View3D;
